dmca.title: [ABUSE] [4248-PHyYMxiN] Notice of Copyright Infringement under DMCA]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, July 05, 2005 11:16 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; sales@virtuanews.co.uk
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] [4248-PHyYMxiN] Notice of Copyright Infringement
under DMCA]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] [4248-PHyYMxiN] Notice of Copyright Infringement under DMCA
Date: Mon, 04 Jul 2005 18:37:08 GMT
From: VirtuaNews Sales Department <sales@virtuanews.co.uk>
To: abuse@theplanet.com


www.orionas.gr
69.93.68.34

Dear Sir/Madam

I am a representative writing on behalf of VirtuaNews, a commercial content
management system.

It has come to our attention that a user has installed VirtuaNews on their
website (shown above) however, they do not own a valid license to use
VirtuaNews.

I can assure you that the site is not licensed and we have no records of
them making an order for our script.

The trace-route which we performed returned information indicating that the
web site is operating on your company's servers.

In accordance with the provisions of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of
1998, you are hereby requested to expeditiously disable access to the web
site based upon this formal Notice.

Please advise of action taken in regards to the infringement so that we may
continue to prevent piracy and be sure that all copies of VirtuaNews are
legally paid for.

Yours truthfully,
James Tingle, VirtuaNews
Email: tingle@virtuanews.co.uk

The copyright infringement details follow below:

Allegedly Infringing items or materials:

VirtuaNews

Original Materials & Copyright Holder:

Copyrighted materials belonging to James Tingle:
VirtuaNews

Location of ORIGINAL WORKS and the ONLY valid place for obtaining the
script:
http://www.virtuanews.co.uk/

URL(s) of Infringed Works or Right:

http://www.orionas.gr/

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

If you would like to post a followup (or reply) to this message please email
sales@virtuanews.co.uk making sure you include the text [4248-PHyYMxiN] in
the subject.

Alternatively, you may use the form located at this page:
http://contact.virtuanews.co.uk/reply.php?emailid=4248&authcode=PHyYMxiN


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCyrIivK/XpJs6oyURAtwUAJ4w2Rw8Kih5dXyX1DHyvRGZMw273gCeLNRi

=dFSl
